original: Åkerman, Dan Victor, jägmästare. Gran vik, f. 21/5/94 i Gärdslöv, Malmöh. 1., av kyrkoh. C. V. o. Alma Åkerman. G. 25 m. Blenda Harling. Barn: Ulla f. 28, Bengt 32. —.Stud:ex. i Malmö 12, utex. fr. skogshögsk, 20. Stud. v. tekn. höigsk. i Aachen 13-14. — E. jägm. i domänv. 20, bitr. jägm. 35, tjg. å Sor-sele, Tivedens, Alingsås o. Kinne revir, bränslechef i Älvsb. 1. södra kristidsstyr :omr. 42-47, jägmäst. i Tivedens revir fr. 48.
translated: Åkerman, Dan Victor, forester. Gran vik, b. 21/5/94 in Gärdslöv, Malmöhus County. Son of the minister C.V. and Alma Åkerman. Married on 25th of (unknown month) to Blenda Harling. Children: Ulla, b. 1928, Bengt, b. 1932. Studied at Malmö studentexamen in 1912, graduated from the Forestry School in 1920. Studied at the Technical University in Aachen from 1913-1914. Started as a forester in the state forest administration in 1920, assistant forester in 1935, served at Sor-sele, Tiveden, Alingsås and Kinne districts, fuel manager in Älvsborg's 1st southern war-time organization area from 1942-1947, appointed forester in Tiveden district from 1948 onwards.
